short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tool to automatically grab data from sites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically grab sets of data from websites and download it as a CSV or JSON file. Basically, a small extension that acts as a screen scraper and lets your easily scrape data from a website. Let's say you have a website with:
Joe Seattle
Jean Austin
Ben Boston
Grab all that data by selecting ".foo" and then make columns for ".name", ".city", and the "src" attribute of "img". Enjoy your screen scraping!
